import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTint, faUndoAlt, faSeedling, faPenAlt, faPencilAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' class FlowerCard extends Component { render () { return (
next watering
in {this.props.waterTime}
min
{this.props.title}
Actions:
Edit
Start
Status:
Watered
); } } export default FlowerCard;
